attributes.action: Stop TFL charging 16 to 18 year olds, in part or full-time education, adult fares for train and tube travel when we have not been afforded any other "adult" privileges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once you receive your 16-17 Oyster card you can no longer pay child rates to travel on TFL buses or tubes; despite the qualification for such a an Oyster card involving being in full or part-time education. 
We simply cannot afford to pay adult rates and have not been afforded the privileges of being an "adult", nor can we vote against it.
